name: Squidlit
description: Every day is a wonderful day for invertebrates! Come join the Squidlits of Blipston for a squishy adventure of spoopy castles, muffins, and wiggles! Made with classic handheld technology in mind, Squidlit strives to be the closest modern recreation of GameBoy game-design methods on the market.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, or 10 Место на диске: 151 MB
recommended_requirements: Рекомендованные: ОС: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, or 10 Место на диске: 151 MB
